title: Good Mod
description: Good Mod is a 1.8.9 Minecraft mod, specifically a niche QOL mod for Hypixel Skyblock. Good Mod implements the best profit calculator for Dungeons, as well as a small number of other features.

title: LaTeX Hub
description: LaTeX Hub is a linux-based application that streamlines LaTeX project management for classes and academic projects. The application implements dynamic snippet loading, easy preamble modulation, git integration, course assignments, and more.

title: LaTeX Snippets
description: A repository of my snippets used for editing LaTeX files. Implemented with LuaSnip.
